Read LINX VisGeneExon File

Source: R/linx_vis.R
linx_visgeneexon_read.Rd

Reads the linx.vis_gene_exon.tsv file.

linx_visgeneexon_read(x)

Arguments

x

Path to linx.vis_gene_exon.tsv file.

Value

The input file as a tibble.

Examples

x <- system.file("extdata/linx/tables/linx.vis_gene_exon.tsv.gz", package = "gpgr")
(l <- linx_visgeneexon_read(x))
#> # A tibble: 298 × 8
#>    ClusterId Gene   Transcript      Chrom AnnotationType ExonR…¹ ExonS…² ExonEnd
#>    <fct>     <chr>  <chr>           <chr> <chr>            <dbl>   <dbl>   <dbl>
